Added a preference to control the location of tools.jar.
Update site generation now uses zip task instead of jar.
Missing ~/build.properties does not cause synchronization to fail anymore.
Now checks that maven_home, java_home and tools_jar are correctly defined before trying to launch.
Fix odd focus behavior in the Maven Project Wizard.
Corrected synchronization behaviour for dependencies specifying <jar/> element.
Closing square bracket doesnot break anymore jelly syntax highlighting.
Fix NPE if jar override is on but no dependencies are present in POM (typically occured when using inheritance).
POM editor pages are now correctly updated.
POM Editor Overview page Heading correctly updated when changing POM name.
Dynamic preference pages donot rely anymore on explicit plugin activation.
Add Maven Nature and Builder. Allows to enable/disable goals on a per-pattern basis. Also allows to auto-trigger goals.
Add a remote Maven repository browser and Search Engine based on Mavenzilla
Revert runner configuration dialog.
Fix project wizard.
Comments including quotes donot pollute the rendering anymore.
Full Description adapts to the page size.
Update maven oriented file icons.
Allow to import/export maven plugin properties.
Pages correctly refreshed if they have already been opened (see also MEVENIDE-23).
Also fix issue causing two launch configurations to be created.
Refresh behaviour now implemented through the use of ILaunchesListener2.
Now correctly use MAVEN_REPO Classpath Variable when synchronizing .classpath.
Now lookup reports registrar goal name instead of plugin directory name.
Tags now allowed within POMs, but still need to be protected with CDATA blocks.
Fix NPE when no launch configurations exist.
AutoBuild is now set to false prior to adding artifacts to .classpath and is restored after that.
Now allow to specify user defined types.
Propagate Maven global plugin directory change (plugins are now cached in ~/.maven/cache).
Mark Argument Tab editor as dirty when a cell loses focus without Enter having been hit.
Preference pages reorganized for better readibility.
Required location preferences can now be regenerated automatically.
Open Property Sheet on List elements double click in POM Editor.
Use Jdom-based unmarshaller to support entities reading. No entities writing yet.
Icons now follow new 3.0 LnF.
Offline mode in maven.xml outline page is now functional.
Pom Creation Action now works on any IContainer.
Pom Creation Action can now use templates.
Mevenide Launch Config Type now has an associated image.
Add POM Template management through a preference pages.
All Maven specific dependencies are now bundled as an external plugin.
Maven Plugin Provider Infrastructure allows plugin providers to statically contribute to Mevenide preference pages.
Add new preferences page to manage user defined dependency types.
Add simple POM wizard that can use templates.
Add Pom validation. Supports infinite inheritance scheme.
